original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.72. Sanidassanattika, Cittānuparivattiduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ cittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika citta anuparivatti duka  anidassana appaṭigham citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ no citta anuparivattī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: The Paṭṭhāna, in the order of the dhammas, in the order of the consciousness elements, in the order of the bases, in the order of the faculties, in the order of the truths, in the order of the dependent origination, in the order of the aggregates, in the order of the paths, in the order of the jhānas, in the order of the fruits, in the order of the meditative developments, in the order of the direct knowledges, in the order of the cessations, in the order of the kinds of cankers, in the order of the ariyan knowledges, in the order of the kinds of purification, in the order of the kinds of grasping, in the order of the kinds of clinging, in the order of the kinds of craving, in the order of the kinds of feeling, in the order of the kinds of contact, in the order of the kinds of element, in the order of the kinds of base, in the order of the kinds of consciousness, in the order of the kinds of rebirth, in the order of the kinds of generation, in the order of the kinds of becoming, in the order of the kinds of destiny, in the order of the kinds of animal, in the order of the kinds of person, in the order of the kinds of knot, in the order of the kinds of flood, in the order of the kinds of bond, in the order of the kinds of hindrance, in the order of the kinds of obsession, in the order of the kinds of search, in the order of the kinds of search for suffering, in the order of the kinds of search for the origin of suffering, in the order of the kinds of search for the cessation of suffering, in the order of the kinds of search for the way leading to the cessation of suffering, in the order of the kinds of search for the gratification in sensual desires, in the order of the kinds of search for the danger in sensual desires, in the order of the kinds of search for the escape from sensual desires, in the order of the kinds of search for the gratification in material things, in the order of the kinds of search for the danger in material things, in the order of the kinds of search for the escape from material things, in the order of the kinds of search for the gratification in immaterial things, in the order of the kinds of search for the danger in immaterial things, in the order of the kinds of search for the escape
